QuestData.Title: Taming The Tamers
QuestData.Description: The sasquatch may be a larger threat, but we also need to wipe out the ogres. The Gordunni have been a nuisance to us for too long, and Lady Shandris wants them completely gone. Let's hope these are the last ones.$B$BKill the Gordunni tamers that keep the beast chained, and make sure they know the price of their meddling.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, and good riddance. I hope we never have to see another ogre here again!
